annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I am showing you how to enjoy a Luxardo Spritz three ways. You and your guests will love it! Make sure to follow Luxardo for...
annotations.title: Luxardo Spritz Three Ways | How to Drink

textContent:
1oz Maraschino
3-4 dashes orange bitters
2 dashes absinthe
3oz prosecco
Top with seltzer

Build over ice in rocks glass
Garnish with grapfruit wedge or orange peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0NUA2PtrNVI
title: Maraschino Spritz
